name: Video Olympics
summary:
Video Olympics is a video game programmed by Joe Decuir for the Atari VCS. It is one of the nine VCS launch titles Atari, Inc. published when that system was released in September 1977.

The games are a collection of bat-and-ball style games, including several previously released by Atari, Inc. as arcade games. The games use the Video Computer System's paddle controllers, and are for one to four players (three or four players requires a second set of paddles).
info:
• 开发: Atari
  • 发行: Atari
  • 别名: Pong Sports

  • 游戏类型: SPG
  • 游玩人数: 1~4人
  • 发行日期: 1977年9月11日
  • 游戏设计师: Joe Decuir
